components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to the MTN Network in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: We have observed a recovery from the SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the MTN network in Nigeria. We are monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the MTN network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the MTN network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the MTN network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Call Failures From a Subset of France Numbers

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery for call failures from a subset of France numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate the issue causing call failures from a subset of France numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still observing call failures from a subset of France numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing call failures from a subset of France numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 November 2023 at 09:00 PST until 02 November 2023 at 10:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Indonesia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 November 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 02 November 2023 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE Our carrier partner EE UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 November 2023 at 14:50 PDT until 02 November 2023 at 19:15 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK customers.
Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 November 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 05 November 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.

incident_updates.body:

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 01 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 02 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
08 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 09 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
15 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 16 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
29 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
